content: this legal text discusses a court decision regarding an inheritance case the court determined that the deceased person had various assets including real estate properties bank accounts and unpaid pension benefits the court identified the heirs including a sister and several nieces and nephews and distributed the assets among them based on their shares the court initiated inheritance proceedings since the deceased did not leave a will the heirs submitted written declarations accepting their shares and the court declared the heirs and their respective shares according to the law the judgment has been made and the heirs need to transfer the property and withdraw the funds once the decision becomes final the net value of the estate is 211000 eur and the heirs are responsible for paying the court fees based on their shares the text also explains the process of filing an appeal in the case the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing enough copies and stating the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be clear and accompanied by the required court fee

metadata.cost: 900,00 EUR fees with inheritance net value of 211'000.00 EUR
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, unpaid pension benefits
